categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Lutdze was a MC80a Star Cruiser belonging to the Rebel Alliance. The Lutdze was part of a Rebel fleet mobilizing at the Delfii system prior to the Battle of Endor.
In Star Wars: TIE Fighter the ships cargo says 'Ackbar'. Whether Admiral Ackbar had visited the ship at the same time as Maarek Stele's recon mission is unknown.
